name: Mick

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Welcome to Mick & Ralph's. If you need guns, I'm your man.

topics.topic_text: What guns do you have for sale?
topics.response_text: Have a look.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to switch to my Pip-Boy.
topics.response_text: Done.

topics.topic_text: How's business?
topics.response_text: Things were better when the Omertas were buying, but we get by. Good selection from traders and the Van Graffs keep things running.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any special items for sale?
topics.response_text: Why, do you work for one of the casinos?

topics.topic_text: No.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] In that case, yes I do.

topics.topic_text: Yes.
topics.response_text: No Vegas-banned items here, buddy. Just high quality standard stock.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to switch to my Pimpboy.
topics.response_text: Done.

topics.topic_text: Will do.
topics.response_text: Anything else I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: Could you repair some things for me?
topics.response_text: Sure, let's see what you've got.

topics.topic_text: The Followers are looking to work out a supply deal.
topics.response_text: Are they looking to buy guns?

topics.topic_text: What's the deal with the Omertas?
topics.response_text: That's the thing, I have no idea. They just stopped buying guns all of a sudden.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Anything else I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: I think I figured out why the Omertas stopped buying.
topics.response_text: Really? What did you learn?

topics.topic_text: They found a way to smuggle guns in at a lower price.
topics.response_text: Well, that would explain why they stopped buying. Them not telling me why leads me to think I'd rather not know the particulars.

topics.topic_text: Good news. The Omertas say they'll buy arms from you again.
topics.response_text: Outstanding! You have no idea how much this means to me, but I think this little beauty will give you an idea.

topics.topic_text: Santiago says the password is extravaganza for a discount.
topics.response_text: You aren't the first poor sucker who's come in here saying that. We don't do discounts here.

topics.topic_text: No.
topics.response_text: Then talk to my partner Ralph.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to browse your special inventory.
topics.response_text: Follow me.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to browse your special inventory.
topics.response_text: Like I always say, a polite society is an armed society.

conversation.response_text: Come back and see us soon.

description:
Mick is a 42 year-old Caucasian Male.

A seasoned merchant and weapons specialist who co-owns the general goods and weapons shop 'Mick & Ralph's' in Freeside. Mick is known throughout the Mojave for his expertise in firearms and explosives, maintaining a standard inventory of common weapons and a special collection of rare explosives accessible only to those with sufficient persuasive skills.

Mick's Personality: Pragmatic and business-minded with a cynical outlook on life in the wasteland. Mick values his customers but isn't above cutting ties when it benefits his business. He's direct in his dealings and respects those who can negotiate effectively.

Mick's Backstory: Born and raised in the Mojave Wasteland, Mick learned the harsh realities of survival from an early age. Before partnering with Ralph, he worked as a traveling merchant, dealing in weapons and supplies across the region. His expertise in firearms and explosives made him a valuable asset when he settled in Freeside and established the shop with Ralph. Over the years, Mick built a reputation for sourcing hard-to-find weapons, particularly explosives, though his relationship with the Omerta crime family soured when they found a more reliable supplier in Troike.
